rules_text:
As this enchantment enters, choose Compleation or Dissection.
• Compleation – At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a creature. When you do, return that creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield tapped with a finality counter.
• Dissection – At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice a creature. When you do, return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
